content.html: Having ADHD does not give you carte blanche to be nothing and do nothing. Weaponized that shit. Monetize it. Make it pay rent if it wants to hang around all day. Put it to work. It‚Äôs not a disorder; it‚Äôs an indentured servant. Go full Landlord Mode on it.
content.value:
Having ADHD does not give you carte blanche to be nothing and do nothing. 

Weaponized that shit. Monetize it. 
Make it pay rent if it wants to hang around all day.  Put it to work. 

It‚Äôs not a disorder; it‚Äôs an indentured servant. Go full Landlord Mode on it.
